theory.brief: Unit 2 học về cuộc sống thành phố với 2 chủ điểm ngữ pháp: (1) So sánh kép (Double comparatives) dùng cấu trúc 'The + comparative..., the + comparative...' để diễn tả mối quan hệ tỷ lệ thuận giữa hai sự vật/hiện tượng, và (2) Phrasal verbs (cụm động từ) liên quan đến cuộc sống đô thị.
examples: The more crowded the city gets, the more congested the streets are. (Càng đông đúc, đường phố càng tắc nghẽn.)
The higher you climb, the colder it gets. (Càng leo cao, trời càng lạnh.)
We need to get around the city by metro. (Chúng ta cần đi vòng quanh thành phố bằng tàu điện ngầm.)
They carried out a survey about city life. (Họ thực hiện một cuộc khảo sát về cuộc sống thành phố.)

exercises.question: The more crowded the city is, __________ it becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the + comparative... (tính từ ngắn thêm -er)
hints: The + so sánh hơn..., the + so sánh hơn...

exercises.question: The __________ you study, the better your grades will be.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ ngắn: The harder..., the better...

exercises.question: The closer we get to the city center, __________ expensive things become.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ dài: the more expensive

exercises.question: The __________ pollution increases, the more health problems people have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N, the more + N

exercises.question: The higher the building is, __________ view we have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the + comparative...

exercises.question: We can __________ the city easily by metro.
exercises.explanation: Get around = đi vòng vòng, đi lại (trong thành phố)
hints: Phrasal verb nghĩa 'đi lại trong thành phố'

exercises.question: The researchers __________ a study about traffic congestion.
exercises.explanation: Carry out = thực hiện (một nghiên cứu, dự án)

exercises.question: Many people __________ the flu in winter.
exercises.explanation: Come down with = mắc bệnh

exercises.question: Teenagers often __________ with friends at shopping malls.
exercises.explanation: Hang out = đi chơi, đi ra ngoài với bạn bè
hints: Phrasal verb nghĩa 'đi chơi với bạn'

exercises.question: The city is trying to __________ noise pollution.
exercises.explanation: Cut down on = cắt giảm, giảm bớt

exercises.question: The __________ the traffic jam, the later we arrive.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ bất quy tắc: worse (so sánh hơn của bad)

exercises.question: The more modern the city becomes, __________ traditional values it loses.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more..., the more...

exercises.question: The __________ we live from downtown, the cheaper the rent is.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ bất quy tắc: far → farther

exercises.question: The __________ facilities a city has, the more liveable it becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The better... (good → better → best)

exercises.question: I often get __________ in traffic jams during rush hour.
exercises.explanation: Get stuck in = bị kẹt trong (tắc đường)
hints: Cụm từ cố định: get stuck in

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more crowded the city gets the more congested it becomes
acceptedAnswers: The more crowded the city gets the more congested it becomes
The more crowded the city gets, the more congested it becomes
The more crowded the city gets the more congested it becomes.
The more crowded the city gets, the more congested it becomes.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The higher you climb the colder it gets
acceptedAnswers: The higher you climb the colder it gets
The higher you climb, the colder it gets
The higher you climb the colder it gets.
The higher you climb, the colder it gets.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: We can get around the city by metro
acceptedAnswers: We can get around the city by metro
We can get around the city by metro.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: They carried out a survey about city life
acceptedAnswers: They carried out a survey about city life
They carried out a survey about city life.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Teenagers hang out with friends at shopping malls
acceptedAnswers: Teenagers hang out with friends at shopping malls
Teenagers hang out with friends at shopping malls.

exercises.question: The __________ you practice, the more fluent you become.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + S + V, the + comparative...

exercises.question: The authorities are trying to __________ air pollution in the city.
exercises.explanation: Cut down on = cắt giảm (ô nhiễm, chi phí)

exercises.question: The nearer we get to the construction site, __________ it becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the + comparative...

exercises.question: The faster the city grows, __________ public amenities it needs.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the more + N

exercises.question: The __________ the street, the safer it is for children.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ: quiet → quieter
hints: Tính từ 2 âm tiết kết thúc -et thêm -er

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The city is trying to cut down on noise pollution
acceptedAnswers: The city is trying to cut down on noise pollution
The city is trying to cut down on noise pollution.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Many people came down with the flu last winter
acceptedAnswers: Many people came down with the flu last winter
Many people came down with the flu last winter.

exercises.question: The more expensive the area is, __________ people can afford to live there.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more..., the fewer... (với danh từ đếm được)

exercises.question: The later we leave, __________ traffic we'll encounter.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The later..., the more...

exercises.question: The __________ the metro system, the easier it is to get around.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ bất quy tắc: good → better
